name: Sevelina big trip dressup game
description:
Perfect dress up game for travel lovers! Dress up 3 different dolls with huge amount of fashion clothes for free. Tokyo, Los-Angeles and London waiting for them!

My Travel Plan: Tokyo — Los-Angeles – London.
The best word to describe Sevelina's style of life is – travelling. She cannot live without traveling and she can not stay at one place for a long time.

As she is fashion lover she is definitely in need to visit top fashion cities around the world.

So on of the places to visit is the Tokyo, super amazing, colorful and exiting place new impressions are guaranteed. Next stop across the ocean is LosAngeles, clubs are waiting for Sevelina, big choice of fashion events is the nice add-on for this city, and probably somebody from Hollywood can take a picture of her and this is awesome. But she don't wish to stuck there for a long time. After all she come to London, this is the city the girls like most of all, and especially Sevelina. When it comes to shopping, London is truly the capital of the world.

So traveling with Sevelina is outstanding experience, while she knew how dress up herself best way for each city where she is located. Large game all-in-one cities never seen before form Sevelina. Don't forget to check out part 2 where Sevelina will visit Mexico, Miami, NY and Paris.
